doc:
Allyn Ann McLerie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allyn_Ann_McLerie 0 Allyn Ann McLerie (December 1, 1926 – May 21, 2018) was a Canadian-born, Brooklyn-reared actress, singer, and dancer who worked with many Golden Age musical theatre's major choreographers, including George Balanchine, Agnes de Mille, and Jerome Robbins. Allyn_Ann_McLerie ( December_1_,_1926 – May_21_,_2018 ) was a_Canadian-born , Brooklyn-reared_actress , singer , and dancer who worked with many_Golden_Age_musical_theatre 's_major_choreographers , including George_Balanchine , Agnes de Mille , and Jerome_Robbins .
